duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle family law cases including divorce, child custody, and adoption proceedings.
Conduct legal research, draft legal documents, and provide sound legal counsel to clients.
Negotiate settlements and represent clients in court proceedings as needed.
Manage and oversee case preparation, documentation, and filing.
Build and maintain strong client relationships through effective communication and advocacy.

education_certification.credential: Juris Doctor (J.D.) degree from an accredited law school
